title: #281:  Black, White, and Periwinkle
description:
After our live show at the Improv, our brains our dead, but the show must go on! Here are the timecodes for what we talk about on today's Watch What Crappens:

00:06:49 - Crappens Mailbag!
00:24:51 - Southern Charm Season Premiere! THOMAAAAAS!!!
01:18:54 - Real Housewives of Potomac Season Finale! Come to Jesus lunch!
02:03:06 - Real Housewives of Atlanta Reunion!

Subscribe at https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/watch-what-crappens/id498130432?mt=2
Support us at patreon.com/watchwhatcrappens
Follow us at facebook.com/watchwhatcrappens

author: watchwhatcrappens@gmail.com (Ben Mandelker & Ronnie Karam)
